short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Add sticky notes to web pages and save your notes.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The Sticky Notes Chrome Extension is a productivity tool designed to enhance your web browsing experience by allowing you to create, manage, and organize digital sticky notes directly on your browser. Whether you are conducting research, managing tasks, or simply jotting down quick reminders, this extension provides a seamless way to keep your notes within reach without leaving your current web page.
